housemonitor Package¶

HouseMonitor Module¶

Created on Sep 10, 2012

@author: gary

class housemonitor.HouseMonitor.HouseMonitor[source]¶

House Monitor is the main program responsible for starting the housemonitor system. It preforms the the following functions:

  1. Set up logging
  2. Print out start message
  3. Parse and set option passed in form the command line
  4. Sets up data that will be available to the rest of the system
  5. Loads all the modules that are in the directory steps
  6. Starts COSM for communicating with COSM.
  7. Starts XMLRPC.
  8. Starts
